description:
Faso Santé (anciennement Faso Pharmacies) permet de retrouver tous les établissements de santé (Pharmacies, Cliniques, Laboratoires, Opticiens, ...) du Burkina Faso (Ouagadougou, Bobo, Koudougou, Fada, Ouahigouya, Banfora, Tenkodogo, Koupèla et Pouytenga). Vous pouvez également consulter les prix généraux des médicaments, le calendrier des gardes (pour les pharmacies), des photographies.

Note: En province, seules les pharmacies sont disponibles pour le moment. Les autres établissements suivront prochainement.

***THE WORLD’S LEADING 3D ANATOMY PLATFORM! TRY IT FOR FREE TODAY***

COMPLETE ANATOMY: A 3D ANATOMY JOURNEY POWERFULLY TAILORED TO YOU

A flexible, inclusive and personalized learning platform that uses the visual power of incredibly detailed 3D models to make anatomy easier to understand.

FREE DOWNLOAD: Create an account for a FREE 3-day trial of premium features and content.
Access Complete Anatomy from ALL your compatible devices with a single annual subscription.

Experience the BEST anatomy platform available today:

THE MOST DETAILED AND COMPLETE human anatomy models, with thousands of individual interactive structures, including a living, beating, dissectible human heart in full 3D

UNIQUE MODEL CUSTOMISATION allowing you to personalise your anatomy model based on your preferences

Atlas of over 700 Screens, based on illustrations from Elsevier's foremost anatomy textbooks

Complete courses, including Female Anatomy presented by Alice Roberts, Dissection courses, Human Anatomy, Point of Care Ultrasound, Clinical Correlates & many more

Dynamic Cross-sections, real-time Muscle Motion, Insertion & Origin mapping, Bone Surface & Landmark mapping, 12 layered systems, Nerve Tracer, Blood Supply Tracer

39 stunning Microscopic anatomy models

AR mode including multiuser AR on compatible devices

Over 1,500 clinical videos on Cardiology, Orthopedics, Ophthalmology, Dentistry & Fitness

English, French, German, Spanish and Chinese language support.

TO BE THE BEST, USE THE BEST: Complete Anatomy is recognised as the best by the world's leading colleges & anatomists.

“Complete Anatomy has a wider depth and breadth of offerings than other anatomy platforms currently available (e.g. Primal Pictures, Visible Body) as well as more detail in its models. Other anatomy apps do not offer the ability to share content and have fewer tools with which to dissect and label models”.

- The Journal of the Medical Library Association

“Complete Anatomy is a lifesaver for me. It's helped me pass all my exams, I have it on all my devices and the accuracy is amazing. I love it!”

- Amy Morgan, Medical Student, Trinity College Dublin

“I would definitely recommend this platform for any institution teaching anatomy”

 - Jorgen Olsen, Educator, University of Copenhagen

“I wouldn't be able to deliver my teaching without Complete Anatomy, especially now that most of the teaching is expected to be online”

 - Munesh Khamuani, Educator, University of Birmingham

STUDENT LICENSE includes:
• Access to 3D models across all available platforms
• Access to all Courses
• Access to over 1,500 videos
• Access to the vast library of curated learning material

PRO LICENSE: all the benefits of the Student License PLUS:
• A license to use in clinical practice for patient education
• A license to present/teach in the classroom, lab or lecture theatre

VOKA Anatomy Pro is a unique complete catalog of medically accurate 3D models of biodigital human anatomy and pathologies, including rare diseases and classic anatomed studies of the digestive system.


This mobile atlas is designed to be always at hand for junior medical students, lecturers, doctors, and medical organizations: to view the models on the required scale, from any angle, both inside and out. It provides additional clarity to pathology understanding and learning, made it much easier various disease.


Our focus is to provide really true-to-life three-dimensional visual of human body, physiology systems, muscular, pathologies and including detailed models of muscles and skeletal. Each and every 3D anatomy model is developed in close cooperation with top-notch medical professionals of research centers, basic on actual DICOM data from CT/MRI, thought out to the very smallest detail, and verified by the medical advisory board, ensuring accuracy in radiology.


All 3D models are labeled, dissected, and segmented to facilitate configuration meeting any visualization needs. For instance, you can hide the outer membrane, which opens up the maximum field of view of the pathology and facilitates understanding its anatomy. In addition to all possible types of pathologies, each c. ategory of the catalog includes reference anatomy 3D models of healthy organs, head, skeleton structures, bones & muscle.


VOKA Anatomy Pro is empowered guide with an AR mode that lets you overlay virtual 3D models on the real world and learn human anato my and pathologies in augmented reality. Enjoy a truly immersive lite experience while me morizing complex anatomy parts!


In the app, you will also find medical articles with terminology that describe the types and subtypes of pathologies from an anatomical point of image, clinical presentation, and treatment methods  including those related to spasticity. Use them to prepare for yoga, classes or refresh your knowledge, flashcards and teach materials in your personal pocket for share with mates.


VOKA Anatomy Pro:


- full-scale immersion in the 3D e-anatomy and pathologies


- the highest level of medical precision


- astonishingly lifelike 3D graphics


- a lightweight app with full functionality since 2017


The app is recommended for:


- medical students including beginners to make it easy to visualize human anatomy and pass exams


- lecturers for lectures and practical classes in online and offline modes


- medical specialists to provide patients with a better understanding of their health conditions


The latest release includes total over 700 pathology and anatomy 3D models:


- Anatomyka

- Congenital heart defects

- Gynecology

- Otorhinolaryngology

- Dentistry

- Acquired heart diseases 

- Respiratory system diseases

- Obstetrics

- CNS and PNS disorders

- Eye disorders

- Vascular diseases

- Liver diseases

- new categories in regular app updates


Features and terms:


1. Zooming in/out to examine each anatomical detail inside and outside 3D model

2. 360° rotation to view 3D models from any angle on your iphone

3. Isolating and hiding anatomical structures to focus on the essentials

4. Reading text information visible on the model system

5. The opportunity to study the names of anatomical structures and their nesting

6. Daily saving the necessary materials to personal collections for quick access

7. Sharing links for useful pathology models and articles with fellows iii

8. Fast speed and convenient search through all the materials like using a medical dictionary

9. AR mode to display 4d+ pathologies in a real-world environment, e .g. on a mannequin


Available in 3 languages:


- English

- German

- Russian


Download VOKA Anatomy Pro for FREE and get all pathology 3D models on your mobile phone. Always with you, to use it anywhere and anytime you like!

A true and totally 3D app for studying human anatomy, built on an advanced interactive 3D touch interface.

Glucoly: Your Reliable Blood Glucose Monitor and Sugar Tracker

Glucoly is your all-in-one solution for managing blood glucose and overall health. This app functions as a reliable blood glucose monitor and sugar tracker, offering comprehensive tools to help you maintain control over your health. Whether you’re monitoring glucose levels or managing diabetes, Glucoly is designed to meet your needs with simplicity and accuracy.

Key Features:
Comprehensive Glucose Monitoring: Log and track your blood glucose levels throughout the day with ease. Whether it’s before meals, after meals, or at bedtime, Glucoly helps you stay informed.
Sugar Tracker: Keep a close eye on your sugar levels, ensuring you stay within your target range. Monitor trends and make adjustments as needed.
Diabetes Tracker: More than just a glucose monitor, Glucoly is a full-featured diabetes tracker that assists you in managing medications, tracking insulin, and monitoring other key health metrics.
Custom Reminders: Set up personalised reminders to check your blood glucose, take medication, or log your levels. Glucoly helps you stick to your routine effortlessly.
Health Reports: Generate detailed health reports that include your glucose readings, medication history, and more. Share these reports with your healthcare provider for better management of your condition.
A1C Estimation: For PRO users, unlock the A1C estimation feature to get an estimate of your average blood glucose levels over time, helping you stay informed between lab visits.
Why Choose Glucoly?
Glucoly is more than just a glucose monitor—it’s your essential tool for managing diabetes and maintaining your overall health. With features tailored to your needs, Glucoly provides the insights and tools necessary to effectively manage your blood glucose.

Join Thousands of Satisfied Users
Thousands of users in the UK trust Glucoly as their go-to blood glucose monitor and diabetes tracker. Join our community today and take the first step towards better health management.

Download Glucoly Today!
Take control of your health with Glucoly. Download now and experience the ultimate blood glucose monitor and sugar tracker in one app.


Glucoly is not a substitute for professional healthcare or advice. Always consult healthcare professionals for medical guidance.

Terms of Use: https://glucoly.app/terms-of-use/

Privacy Policy: https://glucoly.app/privacy-policy/

Glucose Tracker helps to keep your blood sugar levels in your target range and help prevent or delay long-term, serious health problems. Staying in your target range can also help improve your energy and mood. 

Use the App to track your blood sugar:

- When you first wake up, before you eat or drink anything
- Before a meal
- Two hours after a meal
- At bedtime

These are typical blood sugar targets: 

- Before a meal: 80 to 130 mg/dL (4.4 - 7.2 mmol/L)
- Two hours after a meal: Less than 180 mg/dL (10.0 mmol/L)

Your blood sugar targets may be different depending on your age, any additional health problems you have, and other factors. Be sure to talk to your health care team about which targets are best for you.

Glycemic index table allow you to avoid unwanted foods

Use our App for glucose tracking and stay healthy!

Introducing Glucobyte: The All-In-One Diabetes App That's Sweeter Than Sugar

Say hello to Glucobyte, your new partner in sugar-busting crime! This app helps you record, track, analyze, and share your blood glucose data with the grace of a figure skater on your mobile device. Glucobyte is compatible with Apple Health and designed for Pre-diabetics and Type 1 or 2 diabetics who are ready to take the plunge into the world of better health management.

With Glucobyte by your side, you'll be juggling blood glucose, A1C, insulin, medication, ketone levels, carbs, and weight like a pro. So, why wait? Get your hands on Glucobyte today and let's turn those sugar spikes into sugar dunks!

#diabetes #app #glucose #health #management #sugarbusters #A1C #insulin #medication #ketone #carbs #weight #AppleHealth #glucosemonitoring

Disclaimer:

- Glucobyte allows you to record, track, and analyze your blood glucose information, either manually or by syncing with Apple Health. A separate blood glucose meter is required to measure blood glucose levels that can be synced through Apple Health or measurements can be manually entered.
- Glucobyte is not a substitute for professional healthcare or advice. Consult healthcare professionals for medical guidance.

Visit our FAQ: www.glucobyte.app/#faq

Features:

- Record & Track: Easily log blood sugar, insulin, medication, ketones, carbs, and weight. Includes Estimated A1C and Glucose Ketone Index (GKI).

- Quick Notes & Tags: Add notes and tags (e.g., fasting, pre/post-meal) for efficient entries.

- Apple Health Integration: Sync with HealthKit and compatible glucose meters like Dexcom (CGM via Apple Health), Accu-Chek, One Drop, OneTouch, and Contour.

- Seamless Bluetooth Integration: Easily connect with popular blood glucose monitors for effortless data transfer.

- Share Reports: Export blood glucose reports in PDF format to share with doctors and family.

- Stats & Analysis: Monitor your progress with intuitive graphs and statistics, filtering data based on tags.

- Optional Cloud Backup: Securely store data across devices with Glucobyte Cloud.

- Bluetooth & WiFi Sync: Sync data between iPhone and iPad without cloud sharing.bluetooth.

- Security: Protect your data with TouchID, FaceID, or Pin keypad protection.

- Reminders: Set reminders and tasks to manage your blood sugar levels consistently.

- Color-Coded Data: Easily identify low, normal, and high readings with customizable color coding based on American Diabetes Association (ADA) recommendations or create custom categories. Consult with your doctor on which one is right for you.

- Multiple Profiles: Manage multiple user profiles from a single app/device.

- International Units: Supports both US and international height and weight units.

Take charge of your diabetes with Glucobyte, the comprehensive and user-friendly diabetes management app. Download now to access all the tools you need to monitor and improve your blood glucose right at your fingertips.

Discover one of the top pregnancy tracker apps designed specifically for women and expecting parents. MDCalc is the leading clinical decision support app providing 900+ evidence-based calculators, risk scores, and clinical tools to support patient care at the bedside. MDCalc has been trusted by millions of clinicians since 2005.

Why Clinicians Choose MDCalc:

• Created by Physicians, for Physicians - All tools developed and validated by board-certified physicians  
• 900+ Clinical Tools - Risk scores, algorithms, dosing calculators, and more with consistent updates and new tools added regularly 
• Works Offline - Full functionality without internet connection

• CME Tracking - Earn CME just by reading through the clinical content surrounding many of our tools
• Free Registration - Complete access in under 30 seconds

Popular Tools Include:

MDCalc ensures only the highest-quality, clinically relevant tools make it into the app. Each calculator undergoes rigorous evidence appraisal and validation by our network of academic and practicing physician experts.

Vous êtes amené à rechercher de l’information sur le médicament, dans la pratique quotidienne ou lors de vos déplacements ? Bienvenue dans VIDAL Mobile, portail d’information sur le médicament pour le praticien nomade et l’étudiant. VIDAL Mobile est totalement gratuit et fonctionne sans connexion Internet.



*************************************


FONCTIONNALITÉS
- Monographies VIDAL
 • Une fiche d’information pour + de 11 000 médicaments et 4 000 produits de parapharmacie
 • Contenu conforme aux informations officielles et aux référentiels publics
 • Recherche par Nom commercial, Substance, VIDAL Recos, Indication, Laboratoire
- Fiches DCI VIDAL (dénomination communes internationales) disponible depuis la substance
 • Document décrivant les propriétés thérapeutiques d’une substance (DCI, dosage, voie, forme)
- VIDAL Recos
 • 185 stratégies thérapeutiques validées appuyées de grades de recommandation et 260 arbres décisionnels commentés
 • Rédigées par plus de 90 experts sous l'égide du comité scientifique VIDAL
 • Précieux dans le cadre de la FMC et de l’EPP, cet ouvrage s’adresse à tout professionnel de santé
- VIDAL Flash Cards
 • Une manière ludique de mettre à jour la connaissance sur les recommandations, basée sur les VIDAL Recos.
- Interactions médicamenteuses :
 • Ajout de monographies spécialités et DCI dans une ordonnance virtuelle
 • Analyse des interactions médicamenteuses de la prescription virtuelle par sévérité
- Effets indésirables classés par appareil et fréquence
- Modules d’équivalences internationales :
 • Recherche d’un médicament à partir du pays de provenance ou de destination
- Fil d’actualité VIDAL : actualité du médicament organisée par thématiques
- Reco du mois : une recommandation en accès libre
- Liste indicative des spécialités pharmaceutiques françaises contenant des produits dopants
- Lexique des maladies rares pour lesquelles il existe des médicaments spécifiques
- Reco Vaccinations, reprenant les recommandations officielles

Toutes les fonctionnalités sont gratuites. Les achats intégrés restent actifs pour le bon fonctionnement des versions précédentes.



*************************************


CONDITIONS D’USAGE & AUTHENTIFICATION
L’usage de VIDAL Mobile est destiné aux professionnels de santé habilités à prescrire ou à dispenser des médicaments ou à les utiliser dans l’exercice de leur art. Nous vous remercions de bien vouloir vous authentifier avant d’accéder à l’application.
L’utilisation de VIDAL Mobile ne dispense pas le professionnel de santé de vérifier les informations disponibles auprès des autorités ou de toutes autres sources officielles. VIDAL Mobile ne remplace pas la décision du prescripteur, seul juge des thérapeutiques à envisager.

Pour accéder à notre page POLITIQUE DE PROTECTION DES DONNÉES PERSONNELLES ET VIE PRIVÉE : https://www.vidal.fr/donnees-personnelles
Lien vers nos Conditions Générales d’Utilisation : https://www.vidal.fr/vidal-mobile-apple-store

developer: PERIOD TRACKER & PREGNANCY AND BABY CALENDAR LIMITED
description:
Pregnant? Get the free app for expectant parents to track how their baby is growing 

amma Pregnancy Calendar is an indispensable tool for expectant mothers! Get detailed information on the development of your baby at each week of pregnancy. Hundreds of thousands of women have already chosen to use this app, so join them, and us, on this incredible journey!

With amma Pregnancy Calendar you can easily:
- Get DAILY pregnancy info
- Track your pregnancy week-by-week over the 9 months 
- Get baby size information and development updates weekly
- Get information on changes in your body flow
- Manage weight and belly growth gain goals with clinical guidelines for your BMI
- Track contractions and send results to a medic with Contraction Timer
- Pregnancy+ Weight log
- Track baby kicks with Kick Counter
- Get more information about the weekly expectations of pregnancy 
- Share on Facebook, Email, Text & Twitter
- Personal Diary

and much more

Every woman who is expecting a child, is preparing herself for giving birth. Naturally, she will want to know how her baby is developing, what is happening to her body and what other changes are awaiting her until the birth. In this application, you will find a detailed weekly pregnancy calendar giving you ease of access to information about pregnancy and fetal development, changes in a pregnant woman's body, as well as tips on nutrition for pregnant women. For each week of pregnancy, there are four pieces of information: 
•	Baby development,
•	Mother’s body,
•	Mom’s meals,
•	Useful tips.
To use the pregnancy calendar, and count your due date, simply enter the date of your last period and you should see the information about your duration of gestation

This App is not intended for medical use, or to replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, consult with your doctor or midwife.

This app is freely downloadable, however in-app purchase is required to unlock the contents. 
The complete Skeletal System and a few other contents are always freely accessible enabling you to try the app properly.

"Anatomy 3D Atlas" allows you to study human anatomy in an easy and interactive way. 
Through a simple and intuitive interface it is possible to observe every anatomical structure from any angle.
The anatomical 3D models are particularly detailed and with textures up to 4k resolution.

The subdivision by regions and the predefined views facilitate the observation and the study of single parts or groups of systems and the relationships between different organs.

"Anatomy - 3D Atlas" is an application aimed at medical students, doctors, physiotherapists, paramedics, nurses, athletic trainers and in anyone interested in deepening their knowledge of human anatomy.
This app is a fantastic tool to complement classic human anatomy books.

ANATOMICAL 3D MODELS
• Musculoskeletal system
• Cardiovascular system
• Nervous system
• Respiratory System
• Digestive System
• Urogenital system (male and female)
• Endocrine system
• Lymphatic system
• Eye and ear system

FEATURES
• Simple and intuitive interface
• Rotate and zoom each model in 3D space
• Option to hide or isolate single or multiple selected models
• Filter to hide or display each system
• Search function to easily find every anatomical part
• Bookmark function to save custom views
• Smart rotation which moves the center of rotation automatically
• Transparency function
• Visualization of muscles through levels of layers from the superficial ones down to the deepest ones
• By selecting a model or a pin, the related anatomical term shows up
• Description of the muscles: origin, insertion, innervation and action
• Show/Hide UI interface (very useful with small screens)

MULTILINGUAL
• The anatomical terms and the user interface are available in 12 languages: Latin, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean and Turkish
• The anatomical terms can be displayed in two languages simultaneously

SmartBP® is a digital blood pressure app that empowers you to record, observe, assess, and share your blood pressure reports utilising iOS devices and the Apple Watch. Moreover, SmartBP interfaces with Apple Health, providing your health data at your fingertips, and enabling you to be proactive in your own wellbeing. For those grappling with prehypertension or hypertension, SmartBP can aid in tracking progress, spotting trends, and managing all your blood pressure and heart measurements, with the ultimate goal of improving your overall cardiovascular health and blood pressure. SmartBP is a more intelligent way to handle your blood pressure readings and track your improvement.

Disclaimer:

- SmartBP permits you to log, track, and evaluate trends in your blood pressure. You can manually input your readings or use a blood pressure monitor to synchronise with SmartBP through Apple Health. SmartBP in itself does not measure blood pressure. A separate blood pressure monitor is required for this.

- SmartBP is NOT a replacement for a doctor or professional healthcare or advice. Any health-related information provided is for informational purposes only and should not be used to substitute the advice of healthcare professionals.

- SmartBP Cloud Sync is not a replacement for backing up your health data. While we strive for the highest data security, no measures can ensure 100% protection. Regular data backups are the user's responsibility.

For guidance on how to use the app, visit our website

Video: www.smartbp.app
FAQ: www.smartbp.app/faq

Features-

- Log your systolic and diastolic blood pressure, pulse rate and weight. Body mass index (BMI), pulse pressure (PP) and mean arterial pressure (MAP) are automatically calculated. Either manually enter measurements or effortlessly sync them with a supported Bluetooth BP monitor.

- Swiftly add notes (e.g. before dinner) and measurement details (e.g. sitting, left arm) utilising tags.

- Store and access all your blood pressure readings anywhere and anytime using Apple HealthKit. Sidestep manual data entry and reduce mistakes by auto-uploading blood pressure readings to HealthKit by auto-syncing with SmartBP. The following Blood Pressure Monitors can link to HealthKit (check for compatibility with different models):

A&D
Omron
Beurer
Braun
Withings

- Share your blood pressure information with your doctor, healthcare provider or family using email, text message (SMS), Apple HealthKit. Create blood pressure reports in PDF format with blood pressure data, graphs and statistics and share with your GP or healthcare provider.

- View a 7, 14, 30-day summary grouped by daily morning/afternoon averages and tags. Create, share and print summary PDF reports and CSV files.

- Print PDF reports or graphs directly

- Analyse your progress through clear graphs and statistics (including mean and variability). Filter data using tags to assess lifestyle changes or medication effectiveness. Compare tagged graphs side by side and observe systolic vs. diastolic blood pressure correlations.

- Track your Heart Rate trends

- Sync ECG records

- Back up your health data and access it on all your mobile devices with SmartBP Cloud.  This is an optional service. We do not sell your health data.

- Sync directly between iPhone and iPad through Bluetooth or WiFi without sharing on the cloud.

- Back up blood pressure data by exporting to Dropbox, and Drive, or import from CSV files into the app.

- Protect your data with TouchID, FaceID or Pin keypad protection.

- Set medication reminders & track effectiveness.

- Intuitive colour coded data to identify normal, prehypertensive, stage I and II hypertension. These limits can be modified. Categorise your records based on 2017 ACA/AHA, 2023 ESC/ESH or create your own custom categories.

- Create multiple user profiles and manage them from a single app/device.

- Both US and international height and weight units are supported.

MedCalX is a tool that enables medical professionals to easily use complicated medical formulas, scores and classifications.
25 years of experience developing this tool for mobile platforms makes MedCalX the leading medical calculator, with an unparalleled user interface and powerful features.

MedCalX is free to download and use, but you have access only to a subset of formulas.
In-app purchase lets you unlock the whole range of formulas that MedCalX has to offer; more than 300 in total!

Main features:
• A very large selection (more than 300) of relevant formulas, scores, scales and classifications.
• Workflows: create your own series of formulas, text, links and images
• Many different ways to share results (and data): copy to clipboard, email report, print via AirPrint, save to patient database...
• Exclusive patient management feature for saving and accessing results, as well as images and notes. Results can be exported to the desktop as CSV files and shared between your and your colleaugues iOS devices.
• Detailed information and bibliographic references for each formula.
• Support for US and SI units, with easy switching from the keypad.
• Search for entries by name, keywords and categories.
• Takes advantage of iOS 9 – you can now use Spotlight to search for formulas
• Customizable list of favorite equations, synchronized via iCloud.
• Ability to add notes to individual formulas.
• Full support for external (hardware) keyboards

Formulas, scores and classifications include, amongst others:
• Anesthesiology (ASA, Bromage, Charlson, Cormack, Dermatome, Goldman)
• Cardiology (CC/AHA ASCVD, CHADS, EuroSCORE, GRACE, HAS-BLED, Killip, PROCAM, QT-c, TIMI)
• Electrolytes (Corrected Ca, Corrected Na, FENa, Osmolal gap)
• Evidence-Based Medicine (NNT, Odds, Sample size, Two-way table)
• ICU (ABCD2+3, APACHE, CAM-ICU, GCS, Parkland, SAPS, many PE-criteria and trauma scores)
• Neurology (AMTS, Aphasia, Canadian rules, NIHSS, WFNS)
• Obstetrics (APGAR, Bishop, Malinas, Pregnancy Wheel)
• Pediatrics (Age, Target Height, Centor and McIsaac, PRAM, WETFAG)
• Respiratory (BODE, Epworth, GOLD, SMART-COP, Spirometry, Thoracoscore)
• Renal (Cockcroft, MDRD and more Creatinine/GFR calculators, KDIGO and RIFLE)
• ABG analyzer worth $5 in other apps
• Complete infusion management tool, great for ICU nurses
• Complicated scores (CAM-ICU, CDAI, APACHE, POSSUM, SAPS, Euroscore)

If you like MedCalX, we’d appreciate it if you took the time to give us a nice review.

Explore human anatomy, physiology, and the life sciences in interactive 3D with Visible Body Suite! This subscription gives you access to our entire content library on your phone, tablet, and computer, combining the features of Physiology & Pathology, Muscles & Kinesiology, Visible Biology, Anatomy & Physiology, and Human Anatomy Atlas. Join the millions who’ve set aside the textbook, lab specimens, and plastic models and jump into an immersive 3D experience with Visible Body Suite!

Visible Body Suite includes:

Comprehensive 3D Models:
Complete and dissectible male and female gross anatomy, microanatomy, cross-sections, and pathology 3D models. Explore DNA, chromosomes, prokaryotic and eukaryotic cells, plant tissues, and fully dissectible vertebrate and invertebrate models (sea star, earthworm, frog, pig). Compare normal anatomy to common conditions like sprains, kidney stones, and endometriosis.

Interactive Learning & Simulations:
Walk through interactive lessons on physiological processes and pathologies. Visualize conduction in a dissectible, 3D beating heart while following along on an ECG for which you can set the heart rate. Manipulate dozens of muscle action animations to understand biomechanics. Interact with and study virtual simulations of photosynthesis, cellular respiration, mitosis, meiosis, and DNA coiling.

Extensive Information:
Access detailed information for thousands of anatomical structures, including definitions, pronunciations, and common diseases and conditions, as well as in-depth material about muscle attachments and innervation, and bony landmarks.

Engaging Visuals:
Dissect 3D anatomy models on screen or in augmented reality (AR). Watch 3D animations that explain gas exchange, pulmonary ventilation, fluid balance, peristalsis, muscle contractions, and more. View histology slides and diagnostic images.

Study & Assessment Tools:
Create and share 3D Flashcards. Label structures with tags, notes, and 3D drawings. Link sets of models in interactive 3D presentations to explain and review a topic. Take 3D dissection or multiple choice quizzes to test your knowledge and prepare for exams.

Key Body Systems Covered:
Cells and Tissues, Integumentary, Skeletal, Muscular, Nervous, Endocrine, Circulatory, Lymphatic, Respiratory, Digestive, Urinary, and Reproductive systems.

User-Friendly Features:
Simple controls, robust search engine, accessibility, adjustable settings, and multiple language options.

Perfect for medical practitioners, physical and occupational therapists, orthopedics, athletes, yogis, students, medical doctors, professors, and nurses, Visible Body Suite makes learning and teaching anatomy, physiology, and biology visual and engaging.

Subscriptions include multiple updates throughout the year at no additional cost!

A propos de l’application

Première plateforme de collaboration médicale à distance et de formation médicale continue, dédiée aux médecins et étudiants en médecine d’Afrique.

Description de l’application

REMA fournit aux médecins et aux étudiants en médecine d’Afrique, un espace professionnel privé vérifié et sécurisé leur permettant de :
-  Partager des cas cliniques complexes afin d’obtenir rapidement auprès de la communauté médicale, un avis secondaire ou spécialisé afin de prendre de meilleures décisions médicales en faveur des patients et ainsi sauver plus de vies.
-  Publier des images de cas rares et de collaborer en temps réel tout en protégeant la
confidentialité et la vie privée des patients. REMA est en parfaite adéquation avec la
législation et la déontologie médicale.
-  Se connecter en un clic aux confrères de toute l’Afrique afin d’élargir leur cercle professionnel
-  Apprendre et se former au quotidien grâce au partage de connaissances et aux pertinents
modules de formation médicale continue.

REMA représente aujourd’hui la plus grande communauté de médecins exerçant en Afrique.

Inscrivez-vous maintenant puis Partagez, Collaborez et Réseautez entre médecins d’Afrique !
NB : Réservé aux médecins et aux étudiants en médecine à partir de la 3 ème année d’étude minimum.

Do you want to know exactly how long you have been pregnant?

This free app shows you the progress of your pregnancy at a glance. The pie chart shows you your current week of pregnancy and you can see how many days you are already pregnant. In addition, we show you the current trimester and in the countdown how many days are left until your baby is born.

Simply enter your expected date of birth at the start of the app or use our date of birth calculator. This is used to calculate your baby's date of birth based on the time and duration of your last period according to the extended Naegele rule.

With this great “Pregnancy Week” app, you will never forget which week you are pregnant.

All features of this practical app at a glance:
- Course of pregnancy: current week of pregnancy (information in weeks and days), information on the
   Trimester
- Countdown: Days until your baby is born

Pregnancy Tracker by Sprout, trusted by physicians and named a 'Best Pregnancy Tracker' by Forbes Health, is the most innovative app designed to guide you through every step of your pregnancy journey. With stunning interactive 3D baby models, personalised health tracking, and real-time updates, Sprout offers everything parents-to-be need to track their baby’s growth and stay informed.
 
Why You’ll Love Pregnancy Tracker by Sprout:
 
Next-Generation 3D Baby Interaction
• Watch your baby’s real-time development with interactive 3D models, showing lifelike movements and heartbeat.
• Explore each stage of development with an immersive, detailed view of your baby’s growth.
 
Week-by-Week Pregnancy Timeline
• Get personalised, week-by-week insights into your baby’s growth and your own key milestones.
• Create and track your own milestones, customising them with important dates to make your journey truly yours.
 
Daily and Weekly Information
• Receive timely, expert insights on your baby’s growth along with personalised health tips.
• Stay informed with daily updates, tailored to your specific stage of pregnancy.
 
Essential Pregnancy Checklists
• Stay organised with checklists covering everything you’ll need to prepare for your baby’s arrival, including a hospital bag checklist for delivery day.
 
Health & Symptom Tracker
• Log symptoms, track medications, and monitor vitals to ensure both you and your baby are safe.
• Ideal for low-risk and high-risk pregnancies, giving you peace of mind throughout.
 
Pregnancy Journal + PDF eBook
• Capture every special moment in your pregnancy journal and easily create a PDF eBook to share or print as a keepsake.
• Includes 300+ fun prompts to inspire entries and document your journey with belly photos.
 
Kick Counter, Contraction Timer & Weight Tracker
• Easily log your baby’s kicks and movements with the kick counter.
• Prepare for labor with the contraction timer, which tracks contraction patterns as they progress.
• Monitor your weight throughout pregnancy to stay on top of your health goals.
 
Visual Birth Plan Generator
• Create a detailed birth plan, outlining your preferences for labor, delivery, and newborn care.
• Export and share it directly with your healthcare provider.
 
Apple Watch & iOS Widget
• View 3D baby models and track pregnancy updates directly from your Apple Watch and iOS Widget.
• Stay connected to your baby’s progress anywhere, anytime!
 
No Account Required
• Just download and start tracking your pregnancy instantly—no sign-up necessary.
 
Sprout is Physician-Recommended
"Sprout Pregnancy is a really user friendly guide from conception to delivery. It is very comprehensive and accessible and I would recommend this iPhone app to any friend going through pregnancy for the first time."
— Lynne Robinson MB ChB MD MRCOG, Sub Speciality Registrar, Reproductive Medicine, Birmingham Women's Hospital
 
About Sprout
At Sprout, we’re parents like you, committed to creating apps that empower you during every stage of your pregnancy. We design easy-to-use, powerful tools that help you stay organised, monitor your health, and follow your baby’s progress. Our award-winning apps guide you from the first trimester through delivery.
 
Check out our other highly-rated apps: Baby Tracker by Sprout, Fertility & Period Tracker by Sprout, and Health & Medication Tracker by Sprout.

app_name: Livi – See a GP by video
description:
Livi lets you see a GP by video – any day of the week.

Get a GP appointment the same day, or book up to 3 days ahead at a time that works for you. Appointments include prescriptions, specialist referrals and sick notes if you need – all without going to the doctor’s surgery.


LIVI IS PERFECT FOR WHEN…

- You need to see a GP the same day, even on a weekend

- You can't see your usual GP and need medical advice

- You need a prescription

- You need a referral to a medical specialist

- Your child needs to see a doctor

- You need convenience or to choose your appointment time

HELP WITH A WIDE RANGE OF MEDICAL SYMPTOMS

Just like a GP you’d usually see, Livi GPs are happy to offer medical advice for most conditions – although some may require a physical examination.

As well as help for managing long-term conditions, some of the common medical concerns Livi doctors treat include skin conditions and rashes, allergies, digestive problems, women’s health concerns and more.


HOW DOES LIVI WORK?

Download the app, enter your details and select your GP practice.

You’ll then see if you’re eligible for our free NHS GP service and if not, anyone living in the UK can book a pay-as-you-go appointment.

Book a GP appointment for a time that suits you. The clinician will video call you to start your appointment.


TRUSTED BY PATIENTS

“Livi is so easy and safe to use. Doctors are kind and understanding.”

“Talked with a doctor within 5 minutes of asking. Brilliant!”

“What would usually take days was sorted within minutes – and on a Sunday afternoon!”

“Felt as though I was in the surgery across from my doctor – but in the comfort of home.”

“Fantastic, it was a very clear video call and I received quick and easy information. I love how it saves my time!”

Reach New Heights with Our App!

Have you ever wished you were taller? Or felt like your height doesn’t match your ambitions? Now you can take the first step toward change!

Our app offers a unique program of exercises designed to naturally support height growth, developed with careful attention to your body’s anatomy. But this isn’t just another boring workout plan — we’ve added interactive elements, fun challenges, and daily motivation to keep you inspired.

Easily track your progress with simple height measurements. Every centimeter matters, and with consistency, you’ll see how far you can go.

Who knows — maybe soon you’ll reach the top shelf without a chair 
It’s time to grow — together!

User-friendly, comprehensive, and authoritative: Medicine Dictionary and Drug Guide by Farlex is the perfect free drug guide for doctors, nurses, and healthcare consumers. This is NOT a preview or a trial version, and there is no "locked" content. Open the app on your iPhone or iPad and immediately access all content — no subscriptions required!

How do we do it?

TheFreeDictionary.com - Farlex apps have been downloaded tens of millions times across multiple platforms, with top ratings after hundreds of thousands of reviews. We work with the best publishers to bring together trusted content in the most comprehensive, authoritative dictionary apps on the market. Our flagship app is The Free Dictionary (TFD), powered by TheFreeDictionary.com. Find our other apps by searching "Dictionary by Farlex" in the App Store.
